snippet: Dani Dayan, the leader of Israel’s settler movement, is passionately ideological yet profoundly secular, though some settlers would prefer a more confrontational leader.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Dani Dayan, leader of Israel's settler movement; Dayan has devoted the past five years to expanding the Jewish presence across the West Bank as chairman of the Yesha Council, which represents 350,000 settlers in 150 communities.
lead_paragraph: Dani Dayan, the leader of Israel’s settler movement, is passionately ideological yet profoundly secular, though some settlers would prefer a more confrontational leader.

headline.seo: Dani Dayan, Worldly and Pragmatic Leader of Settler Movement
headline.main: A Settler Leader, Worldly and Pragmatic
headline.print_headline: A Settler Leader, Worldly and Pragmatic
